model.name: aop
model.title: Aop
model.description: Does processing before and/or after the route is completed
model.label: configuration

beforeUri.description: Endpoint to call in AOP before.

afterUri.description: Endpoint to call in AOP after. The difference between after and afterFinally is that afterFinally is invoked from a finally block so it will always be invoked no matter what eg also in case of an exception occur.

afterFinallyUri.description: Endpoint to call in AOP after finally. The difference between after and afterFinally is that afterFinally is invoked from a finally block so it will always be invoked no matter what eg also in case of an exception occur.

id.description: Sets the id of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node
